item.title: South Carolina deputy killed in what sheriff says was an ambush
item.description: A deputy has been killed in an ambush while attempting to arrest a suspect.

item.title: Televangelist Jimmy Swaggart, whose ministry was toppled by prostitution scandals, dies at 90
item.description: Jimmy Swaggart, the televangelist whose multimillion-dollar ministry was crippled by his encounters with prostitutes, has died

item.title: Ford Foundation selects Yale dean and democracy scholar Heather Gerken to succeed Darren Walker
item.description: The Ford Foundation has announced Yale Law School Dean Heather Gerken as its next president
